author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Alexandra Palace has miles of hidden basements and tunnels beneath it; and they’re filled with decades of lost BBC history. This was the birthplace of British television in 1936; and the remnants are still down there if you know where to look.

I found abandoned studio gear; a Ferguson Reflections TV; a full bowls alley with a 1985 scoring system; dusty archive records; and even a wall made from thousands of broken bottle shards for reasons nobody can explain.

A strange; eerie; fascinating time capsule hiding right under one of London’s most famous landmarks.

#AlexandraPalace #BBC #RetroTech #UrbanExploration #BroadcastHistory
title: BBC Secrets Hidden under Ally Pally #exploration #urbanexploration #lostplaces #history
